channel.title: The people on my server go?
channel.description:
They go bye bye
I can only get me and 1 other person on the server, but if someone else tries to log on during that time the other person will lose connection and the other person will get on..
I did the playerhandler thing with public static final int maxPlayers and i changed the max number of people to 80.. but it still doesnt work
Anyone know whats up?
Btw.. My internet speed is normally 56.0Mbps or 48.0Mbps so i dont think it is that?

item.title: The people on my server go?
item.dc:creator: @sk8ter671 sk8ter671
item.description:
@sk8ter671 wrote:

idk… the last problem was my old house i couldnt get people on the server…

but we mobved and i decided to try it and it works now…

except for the people problem

Read full topic
